english.segment1: All these emotions I go through. I am so in love with you. True love has caught my heart. Girl its more than a feeling
english.segment2: Chorus. True love has come " Wo oh. And swept me away. The big sea of love. We're together forever. You have my heart. You touch me each day. You are daughter of Sarah
english.segment3: I never knew why God blessed me. With a woman like you. But now I know His hand's on me. And He knew I needed you
english.segment5: I will always treasure you. You are there when I need you. It is love that will prevail. And stand the test of time
